section.heading: The Advisory Board Company — community benefits.
section.text: Within 30 days of [February 26, 2016], the Company shall enter into a community benefits agreement with the Mayor that shall include requirements for training, employment, and youth development and free services to underserved communities in the District.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-83: § 3 of D.C. Law 22-83 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(b) of D.C. Law 22-83 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
